product_name: The North Face Sharlet Wrap Sweater - Women's
long_description: Settle in for a cozy afternoon by the fire or head out for long lunch in the comfort of the Sharlet Wrap sweater by The North Face. Asymmetric full-length zipper with hanging fabric can be worn open like a loose cardigan. Soft cotton feels great next to skin; a touch of stretch ensures flattering shape and fit. Draped collar adds casual elegance. The North Face Sharlet Wrap sweater features a droptail hem for casual shape and style.
short_description: Settle in for a cozy afternoon by the fire or head out for long lunch in the comfort of the Sharlet Wrap sweater by The North Face.
